survey_name: Consumer Preferences for Electric Vehicle Charging Stations Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to understand consumer preferences and experiences regarding electric vehicle (EV) charging stations to improve accessibility and user satisfaction.

questions.question_text: How often do you use public electric vehicle charging stations?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for clarity. Ensure options cover all frequency ranges.

script.question_text: How often do you use public electric vehicle charging stations?

questions.question_text: What types of charging stations do you typically use? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Weekly', 'Monthly', or 'A few times a year' in Q1
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-select. Include an 'Other' option with a text field for additional input.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Checkbox (MULTI_CHOICE). Add an open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What types of charging stations do you typically use? (Select all that apply)
script.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Weekly', 'Monthly', or 'A few times a year' in Q1

questions.question_text: What factors are most important to you when choosing a charging station? (Rank top 3)
answer_options: Availability of amenities nearby (e.g., restrooms, shops)
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Weekly', 'Monthly', or 'A few times a year' in Q1
questions.client_notes: Use a ranking question format (drag-and-drop or numerical input). Limit to top 3 choices.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Ranking (custom script for top 3 selection). Include an open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What factors are most important to you when choosing a charging station? (Rank top 3)
answer_options: Availability of amenities nearby (e.g., restrooms, shops)
script.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Weekly', 'Monthly', or 'A few times a year' in Q1

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the current availability of charging stations in your area?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for satisfaction. Ensure the scale is balanced.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the current availability of charging stations in your area?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you like to see in public EV charging stations?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback. Limit response length to 500 characters.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Open-text (OPEN_TEXT). Set character limit.

script.question_text: What improvements would you like to see in public EV charging stations?
